title: CoinShares Exercises Option to Buy Bitcoin ETF Provider Valkyrie to Add U.S. Arm
description: CoinShares said the decision is a direct result of the SEC's approval of the listing of a spot bitcoin ETF.

title: Elizabeth Warren: SEC 'Wrong on the Law' Over Bitcoin ETF Approval
description: The Senator claimed that the SEC had let crypto "burrow even deeper into our financial system," and pressed for AML rules.

title: Spot Bitcoin ETF: Should retail investors be concerned?
description:
Either a good or bad investment option for retail investors, spot Bitcoin ETFs will unlikely reduce demand for BTC in the long term.

The approval of the first spot Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded funds (ETF) in the United States will enable billions of dollars in institutional money to enter the market.

According to public trading data, the total volume across ten spot Bitcoin ETFs reached more than $4.5 billion on the first day of trading on Jan. 2024. Grayscale Investments’ Bitcoin ETF alone reportedly handled more than $2 billion in volumes.

As massive amounts of institutional capital are now expected to flow into the Bitcoin market, one might get concerned about the potential implications of a spot Bitcoin ETF for smaller investors.

Read more

description: Mehmet Simsek, the Turkish Finance Minister, recently revealed that a draft of his country’s crypto regulations is now in the final stage. title: SOL Replaces XRP on HKVAC’s Global Large Cryptocurrency Top 5 Index
description:
The Hong Kong Virtual asset rating agency HKVAC will remove XRP from its Global Large Cryptocurrency Top 5 Index, according to a recent announcement on its website.  The report details that XRP will be replaced by the Layer-1 blockchain network Solana. The  change follows months of heightened interest and investor activities in Solana. As a […]

The post SOL Replaces XRP on HKVAC’s Global Large Cryptocurrency Top 5 Index appeared first on Coin Edition.
